name: Baz
bio: Exasperated at the state of the world and the web, we founded Tonk to help liberate the open internet beyond just finance. To that end, we work with onchain game studios to bake hidden information into their worlds. We also authored the Privacy Playgrounds Wiki and started Dappicom, a zkNES emulator in Noir. Our work sits in the sweet spot between applied cryptography, gaming and the philosophy of privacy-enabled coordination.
